sentences.sContent: It springs from the idea of a notebook full of doodles, like that of your typical teenager during English class.
sentences.sContent_eng: It springs from the idea of a notebook full of doodles, like that of your typical teenager during English class.
sentences.sCn: 这灵感来源于在笔记本上的涂鸦乱画，就像你十几岁时在英文课上所作的那样。

sentences.sContent: One summer, Gates contracted to write a class scheduling program for his high school. He made sure to "preload" himself into an English class with a dozen girls and no other boys.
sentences.sContent_eng: One summer, Gates contracted to write a class scheduling program for his high school. He made sure to "preload" himself into an English class with a dozen girls and no other boys.
sentences.sCn: 盖茨在某个暑假承接了为所就读中学编写班级安排的程序，结果，在他所上的那个英语班里面，女生成群，而盖茨却是唯一的一个男童鞋。

sentences.sContent: In my own experience, learning French at high school taught me so much more about grammar than English class ever did.
sentences.sContent_eng: In my own experience, learning French at high school taught me so much more about grammar than English class ever did.
sentences.sCn: 根据我自己的经历，我在高中学法语当中学到的语法知识比在英语课上学到的多的多。
